title: HELP !!! League Game doesn't open after Champ Select
body:
So I've gotten Low Priority like 3 times now due to this, but my league loading screen and game doesn't open after champion select closes, I've checked all firewalls and stuff like that, and googled many guides but still nothing.
**EDIT**: Game opens in custom but not Normals or Ranked.. Weird.

replies.body:
If you've already tried all the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), then I recommend you reach out to our tech specialists by gathering a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) and [submitting a ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.
